title: 命令方块tellraw指令extra三行不行版本1.10.2求助
author: sky_flying
txt_content: 1.10.2滴tellraw指令用extra套三个加color不行！版本1.10.2,指令：/tellraw @a {"text":"@p 刚刚获得了 ","color":"white","extra":[{"text":"[命令好厉害] ","color":"purple","extra":[[{"text":"成就！","color":"white"}]}} 去掉第三个就可以。求助...=-=

replies.author: BlackCB.
replies.txt_content: tellraw @a {"text":"@p 刚刚获得了 ","color":"white","extra":[{"text":"[命令好厉害] ","color":"purple","extra":[{"text":"成就！","color":"white"}]}]}

replies.author: BlackCB.
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 天狼星black 于 2018-7-16 14:07 编辑 

第三个extra后面多了个中括号啊你

replies.author: sky_flying
replies.txt_content:
天狼星black 发表于 2018-7-16 14:05
第三个extra后面多了个中括号啊你
前面还是后面啊？能把一整条修正的发出来吗？
